text: Any commission issuing under the provisions of this subtitle shall, where the rank remains unchanged, bear the date of the commission held on Feb. 18, 1909; and any officer who has served continuously in the same grade may be recommissioned with rank from date of his original commission to that grade.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 39-902.

1973 Ed., § 39-902.

Editor's Notes

The reference to "this subtitle" in this section includes all sections of Subtitle I of Title 49 except §§ 49-217, 49-303, and 49-906.

DC CODE § 49-802

Current through December 11, 2012
